home.p1: As a Full-Stack Developer with specialized expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript, I offer a comprehensive range of development and consulting services. My focus is on development with Angular in the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, Node.js), complemented by a deep foundation in IT infrastructure design, which includes both cloud-native and cloud-agnostic solutions. My approach integrates best practices in software architecture, with a particular emphasis on Domain-Driven Design, to ensure that each solution is not only technically advanced but also business-sensible and adaptable.
home.p2: Furthermore, my specialization extends to the field of Observability within the MEAN stack, where I utilize techniques and tools such as OpenTelemetry to provide precise monitoring and a comprehensive tracing and logging infrastructure. This expertise enables me not only to respond to requirements in real-time but also to take proactive measures to optimize the performance, reliability, and scalability of applications.
home.p3: As your technical partner, I understand the importance of reliability, scalability, and user experience. I am qualified to deliver innovative solutions that support your business objectives and give you a competitive edge in your industry. Let's work together to shape the future of technology and create exceptional experiences for your users.
home.p4: I invite you to get in touch with me to discuss how I can support your business with customized software solutions. Let's shape the future of your IT together.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
